title: Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023), insofar as it is not already
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 

2023 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited judicial appointment commission act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023), insofar as it is not already
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the Judicial
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the day on which the Judicial 
Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023), insofar as it is not already 
in operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 October, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [553] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day january 2025 appointed day judicial appointment commission act 2023 (no 33 2023) insofar already operation shall come operation given official seal 17 october 2024 helen mcentee minister justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th october 2024 553 3

title: Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023), insofar as it is not already
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order is the second and final commencement order under the Judicial 
Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023). The Order commences 
the provisions of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023 not 
commenced under S.I. No. 114/2024. The provisions of the Judicial 
Appointments Commission Act 2023 rendered operational by this Order 
primarily consist of provisions designed to be brought into operation at the time 
when the Judicial Appointments Commission is being established. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [553]
